short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pass your prompt directly for ChatGPT as a URL parameter! No more copy pasting!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to input your ChatGPT prompt through a URL parameter. Open the link https://chat.openai.com/?q=hello in your browser with this extension installed. You will observe that the query text (in this case, "hello") is automatically entered into the text area. (Note: You must be logged in to ChatGPT for this extension to function.)
